name: Mirror World (ravancloak)
description:
Short RPG made for a contest on Slime Salad by Ravancloak (art, music, desing, coding) Takuika Ninja (music, coding, design) and Zman (art).

Controls are Z to interact/use, X to run/cancel, and Enter to open the menu. Controllers should work as well.

Content warning: There is swearing and mildly suggestive art.
